TopicTitle: I've got plans for a Hype Space Station

Articles.Content: What I'm going to do is dock together a bunch of fuel tanks, each one with the word HYPE on them, written in solar panels. Lol.
The panels in question had better be Gigantors.
You should save the reveal until the 0.90 hype thread.

and this should probably be in the rocket builders discussion, not the main discussion...

And lights, you will need lots of lights
Hype Stations? I don't think they exist.
The worst part of this thread/station is all of the extravagant and intensive promotion surrounding it before public release.
Too soon. Release not imminent. Try again (much) later.
